content.rendered:
[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1476023831779{margin-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Web Designing Services” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:left|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”So, you’re ready to get started with your website, but don’t know what services you need?” font_container=”tag:h5|font_size:16px|text_align:left|color:__USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]Your business Web designing  shouldn’t end with simply installing a default theme and customizing the given options. All of the elements should be aligned with your brand. After all, it is the face of your business or your brand identity. Your website is the first thing that your potential customers will see once they search for you online. So if that’s the case, shouldn’t it be engaging and professional-looking? After all your entire brand’s reputation and financial success depends on your online presence.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”11274″ img_size=”400×400″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]So, don’t worry! Digital Consulting Pandit offers complete best Web Designing Services, development, management & support. Additionally, we offer Content Writing & Editing, Creative images, Image Editing & Web Graphics services. While we use technology and code, we focus on the user journey and their experience on your website. Our web design projects design such a way that it starts at the search engine results page and migrate through content and call to actions. Our website design solutions are customizable & affordable which creates a digital transformation that delivers revenue and ROI to you and your organization.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator color=”black”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Why Choose Digital Consulting Pandit as a Website Design Company?

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Visual Design

We design your website to Showcase your brand and increase engagement with our great-looking web designs.
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

User-Friendly

We make browsing and navigating through the products and services on your site so much easier which leads to quick conversions.
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Responsive Layout

We make sure that your website is accessible to all users no matter what device they are using.
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator color=”black”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Our website design & development services include:” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_column_text]

  • Custom Photoshop Design
  • Installation & Setup of WordPress
  • WordPress Design and Page Layout Customization
  • E-Commerce Site Setup & Customization (WooCommerce)
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Integration of social media

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Additional services you may need:” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_column_text]

  • Content Writing & Editing
  • Creative images
  • Image Editing & Web Graphics

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Determine what you need:” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_column_text]Here are some questions to ask:

  • Will you need a custom design, or is an out-of-box template sufficient?
  • Who’s going to write and edit your web content?
  • Who’s going to add your content?
  • Do you need a content management system?
  • Are you going to sell products online?
  • Which features and add-ons do you need for this?
  • Which kind of imagery do you need?
  • How often will you update your website’s content?
  • What’s your starting budget for that?
  • What’s your estimate for maintenance?

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator color=”black”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_type=”bg_color” bg_override=”ex-full” bg_color_value=”__USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Get Web Design Services That Drive Business Growth & Maximize Your Revenue.” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular” css=”.vc_custom_1598699994274{margin-top: 22px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Contact Us Today!” font_container=”tag:h6|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_btn title=”Get a Quote!” style=”custom” custom_background=”#2a2a2a” custom_text=”#ffffff” size=”lg” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.digitalconsultingpandit.com%2Fcontact-us%2F|title:Contact%20Us|target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator color=”black”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Related Services” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Adwords

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Social Media Marketing

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Google Analytics

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
